title: Kremná
text:
Kremná is a <a href="village">village</a> and <a href="municipality">municipality</a> in <a href="Star%C3%A1%20%C4%BDubov%C5%88a%20District">Stará Ľubovňa District</a> in the <a href="Pre%C5%A1ov%20Region">Prešov Region</a> of northern <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a>.
History.
In <a href="history">historical records</a> the <a href="village">village</a> was first mentioned in 1773.
Geography.
The <a href="municipality">municipality</a> lies at an <a href="altitude">altitude</a> of 607 metres and covers an <a href="area">area</a> of 4.141 km². It has a <a href="population">population</a> of about 110 people.
